title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully with valid credentials and maintain a session.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard.
Verify that a session is established and maintained for subsequent requests.

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Validate that login fails with invalid username or password and an appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login fails and an error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Dashboard Loads with Accurate and Updated Analytics
description: Ensure the dashboard displays correct and real-time metrics and charts after login.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials and navigate to the dashboard page.
Verify that key business metrics are displayed.
Verify that charts render correctly and reflect latest data.
Verify that dashboard data updates in real-time or on refresh.

title: Create New Product Successfully
description: Verify that the user can add a new product with valid data and it appears in inventory immediately.

steps.description: Navigate to the products page after login.
Click on 'Add New Product' button.
Fill in valid product details including name, SKU, quantity, and price.
Submit the new product form.
Verify product is listed in the product inventory.
Verify product details persist after page reload.

title: Edit Existing Product Successfully
description: Check that editing an existing product updates its details and changes are reflected instantly.

steps.description: Navigate to the products page.
Select an existing product to edit.
Modify product details such as name or quantity.
Save changes.
Verify updated product details appear in the inventory list.
Verify changes persist after page reload.

title: Delete Product and Confirm Removal
description: Validate that deleting a product removes it from the inventory and it no longer appears in listings.

steps.description: Navigate to the products page.
Select a product and click the delete option.
Confirm deletion prompt.
Verify the product is removed from the inventory list immediately.
Verify product does not reappear after page reload.

title: Create New Customer Record
description: Ensure that a new customer can be added with valid details and is listed under customers.

steps.description: Go to the customers section.
Click on 'Add Customer' button.
Enter valid customer information including name, contact details, and address.
Submit the customer creation form.
Verify the new customer appears in the customer list.

title: Edit Customer Details
description: Verify that existing customer details can be modified and updates are saved properly.

steps.description: Navigate to the customers list.
Select a customer and edit details such as phone number or email.
Save the changes.
Verify customer information is updated in the list and customer view.

title: Create Sales Invoice Successfully
description: Validate the sales module supports creating a new invoice with accurate details and saves correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the sales invoices creation page.
Enter valid invoice details including customer, products, quantities, and prices.
Submit the invoice creation form.
Verify the new sales invoice is listed in the sales invoices page.

title: Create Sales Quotation Successfully
description: Ensure users can create and save sales quotations accurately and they appear in the quotations list.

steps.description: Navigate to the sales quotations creation page.
Fill in quotation information including customer and product details.
Submit the quotation form.
Verify that the quotation is listed in the quotations overview page.

title: Manage Purchase Invoices and Supplier Details
description: Verify creation, editing, and listing of purchase invoices and linked supplier information.

steps.description: Navigate to purchases section and access suppliers list.
Add new supplier with valid information and verify addition.
Create a purchase invoice linked to a supplier with valid data.
Verify purchase invoice is saved and appears in purchase invoices listing.
Verify supplier details are correctly associated with purchase invoices.

title: Track and Categorize Expenses
description: Test that expenses can be recorded with correct categories and expense history is maintained.

steps.description: Navigate to expenses module.
Add a new expense with a valid category, amount, and description.
Submit the expense entry.
Verify the new expense appears in the expense history list under the correct category.
Verify expense totals are updated accordingly.

title: Admin User Role Management
description: Ensure that admin users can create, edit, and assign roles to users with appropriate permission changes.

steps.description: Login as admin and navigate to the admin users page.
Create a new user and assign a role.
Edit an existing userâ€™s role.
Verify role changes affect user permissions correctly.
Verify updated user data persists after reload.

title: Generate Sales Report Accuracy
description: Validate that the sales report reflects accurate transactional data and filters work correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to sales reports page.
Generate report for a specific date range.
Verify report includes all sales transactions within the date range.
Verify all calculated totals and metrics (e.g., revenue) are accurate.

title: Generate Stock Report Accuracy
description: Ensure stock level reports update dynamically and correctly represent current inventory status.

steps.description: Navigate to stock reports page.
Request current stock level report.
Verify reported stock levels match actual product quantities.
Verify report updates immediately after inventory changes (additions, deletions, edits).

title: Generate Revenue Report Accuracy
description: Verify revenue reports correctly aggregate income data and respond accurately to filter criteria changes.

steps.description: Navigate to revenue reports page.
Select various filters such as date ranges and categories.
Verify revenue totals update correctly based on applied filters.
Cross-verify report figures against actual sales data.

title: Validate Session Expiry and Re-login
description: Check that user session expires after a set timeout and user is redirected to login page.

steps.description: Login and remain inactive until session expiration.
Verify session expires after predefined timeout.
Attempt an action requiring authentication after session expiry.
Verify user is redirected to login page and prompted to authenticate again.

title: Access Control for Non-Admin Users
description: Verify that users without admin roles cannot access admin pages or perform admin-only actions.

steps.description: Login as a regular user (non-admin).
Attempt to navigate directly to admin pages via URLs.
Verify access is denied with an appropriate error or redirection.
Attempt to perform admin-only actions via UI remnant or API.
Confirm actions fail and proper permission error is returned.

title: Form Validation for Product Creation
description: Check that the product creation form validates mandatory fields and rejects invalid inputs.

steps.description: Navigate to new product creation page.
Attempt to submit the form with empty mandatory fields.
Verify validation errors are displayed for required fields.
Enter invalid data such as negative quantity or invalid price format.
Verify input validation prevents form submission with invalid data.

title: Error Handling on Network Failure During Save
description: Validate that the system gracefully handles network errors during save operations and informs user appropriately.

steps.description: On any module (e.g., product or sales), initiate a save operation.
Simulate network failure during save.
Verify the user is notified of the failure with retry or error message.
Recover network and retry save to confirm functionality restores correctly.
